name: Habit Tracker
description:
Our habits govern our lives, literally. Research shows that around half of our daily actions are driven by repetition. Regular sleep and exercise, a healthy diet, an organized schedule, and mindfulness are just a few examples of practices that — if done regularly — can improve our work, relationships, and mental health.

And this is where this habit tracker concept can help. This concept will help users in building a personalized schedule by answering some simple questions.
